name: Room of Rememberance
description:
Room of Remembrance is a Arg like puzzle escape room with heavy inspiration taken from Rusty Lake. In RoR you are tasked with solving puzzles and cracking codes in order to help you ‘remember’ a code phrase which will allow you to escape the Room.

To win you’ll need to find 3 words to say to the guards to allow you out. This game uses cryptic ciphers and puzzles so I would recommend making notes and there are no red herons.

P.S. The input box is used to set tv signal, input the computer password and give the passcode to the guards.

P.P.S I’d recommend making the cipher wheel your self.
